Supply Chain+Logistics+Route Optimizatio.EXPLANATION: Measures the average distance of delivery routes.
Supply Chain+Logistics+Route Optimizatio.FORMULA: Total Distance Traveled for Deliveries / Total Number of Deliveries

Supply Chain+Logistics+Route Optimizatio.EXPLANATION: Measures the number of deliveries made per unit distance traveled.
Supply Chain+Logistics+Route Optimizatio.FORMULA: (Total Number of Deliveries / Total Delivery Route Distance)

Supply Chain+Logistics+Route Optimizatio.EXPLANATION: Measures the fuel consumed per delivery route.
Supply Chain+Logistics+Route Optimizatio.FORMULA: Total Fuel Consumed / Total Distance Traveled on the Route

Supply Chain+Logistics+Route Optimizatio.EXPLANATION: Measures the reduction in time vehicles spend idle.
Supply Chain+Logistics+Route Optimizatio.FORMULA: (Previous Idle Time - Current Idle Time) / Previous Idle Time * 100

Supply Chain+Logistics+Route Optimizatio.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of deliveries made on time for each route.
Supply Chain+Logistics+Route Optimizatio.FORMULA: (Number of On-Time Deliveries per Route / Total Number of Deliveries per Route) * 100

Supply Chain+Logistics+Route Optimizatio.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of instances where delivery routes deviate from the planned route.
Supply Chain+Logistics+Route Optimizatio.FORMULA: (Number of Deviations from Planned Route / Total Number of Routes) * 100

Supply Chain+Logistics+Route Optimizatio.EXPLANATION: Measures the average time it takes to complete a delivery route.
Supply Chain+Logistics+Route Optimizatio.FORMULA: Total Time for Deliveries on a Route / Total Number of Deliveries on the Route

Supply Chain+Logistics+Route Optimizatio.EXPLANATION: Measures the maintenance cost for each route covered by a vehicle.
Supply Chain+Logistics+Route Optimizatio.FORMULA: Total Vehicle Maintenance Costs / Total Number of Routes
